name: Eye of D'akess
description:
“Do you feel it… pulling you ever closer?”
“Calling you towards the one thing that you must find...”

After acquiring a mysterious treasure map, Ricki Alena and Edmund Willis create an unlikely partnership at the promise of treasures and adventure.

As the journey takes them from Edmund’s hometown and into the untamed wilderness beyond its borders, old secrets long forgotten are uncovered once more. To the depths of the ruins of D’akess…

Eye of D’akess is a small “short story” RPG, focused on letting the player play through a self-contained story in a few hours.

Play as Ricki and Edmund in this 2D rpg, taking them through level 1 to a maximum of 20 as they traverse through the different areas of the game.
